tool_description: JSONpedia API is designed to simplify access at MediaWiki contents transforming everything into JSON. Such API provides a REST service to parse, convert, and enrich WikiText documents. JSONpedia supplies capabilities for recursive template expansion and mapping to DBpedia. This framework has been designed to extract linguistic resources from the Wikipedia and to enable massive data scraping. Our mission is to deliver a general purpose infrastructure for Wikipedia multi language data consumpti...
name: JSONpedia
title: JSONpedia

api_list.name: annotate

required_parameters.name: entity
required_parameters.description: Specify entity as combination <lang>:<wikipage>, examples: en:London, en:Albert_Einstein

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://michelemostarda-JSONpedia-v1.p.rapidapi.com/annotate/resource/json/en:Albert_Einstein?&procs=extractors,splitters,structure"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "michelemostarda-JSONpedia-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://michelemostarda-JSONpedia-v1.p.rapidapi.com/annotate/resource/json/{entity}?&procs=extractors,splitters,structure"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "michelemostarda-JSONpedia-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
